fields.name: Secret Passwords
fields.description: You have to find the number of connected components! so just check for each character which strings will be connected.

fields.name: Journey to the Moon
fields.description: We just want what number of people are there from different different countries use dsu!

fields.name: Roads and Libraries
fields.description: Either you will make libraries in each city of connected cites or construct roads.

fields.name: Mocha and Diana (Easy Version)
fields.description: You can make an edge only when they connect two nodes from different connected components, check if two nodes can be joined for both mocha and diana

fields.name: Disjoint Sets Union 2
fields.description: We can store the maximum and minimum of two connected components and while merging we should also make the required changes.
